articles.title: Crematoriums In China Fill Up Amid Rise In Covid Cases: Report - NDTV
articles.description: As COVID-19 cases continue to rise at a meteoric pace in China, crematoriums throughout the country are getting packed and people are forced to wait for hours to get their loved ones cremated, American broadcaster CNN reported.
articles.content:
China is considering only deaths happening due to pneumonia and respiratory failures.
